# MTLCaptureDestination.developerTools

**Case**

An option specifying that data should be captured to Xcode and that execution should stop in Xcode after the data is captured.

## Declaration

```swift
case developerTools
```

## Choosing a destination

- **MTLCaptureDestination.gpuTraceDocument**: An option specifying that the captured command data should be saved to a GPU trace document.

items.description: An option specifying that the captured command data should be saved to a GPU trace document.
